mention.text: 306 pp. , $ 18.95 ; CHARLIE Francis , testifying in 1988 in Toronto at a federal inquiry about the use of performance-enhancing drugs in sports
Francis , the Canadian national sprint coach
To help a few gifted people
the use of performance-enhancing drugs in sports
`` Speed Trap , '' an elaboration of what Francis said at the inquiry and a history of his remarkable path through the world of track and field.
an elaboration of what Francis said at the inquiry and a history of his remarkable path through the world of track and field.
Millions of dollars worth of endorsements
an official -LRB- but still illicit , of course -RRB- program
People who want running to be a `` natural '' sport
